name: TheSpaceTravel
0:
”Alexa,Launch Space travel”
”Alexa,Start space travel”
”Alexa, ask space travel to take off”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: space travel
des:
"The space travel" is a interactive virtual tour to the planets in the solar system.
It engages kids in a intuitive way.This helps them gain interesting knowledge about the planets and solar system in a entertaining and enjoyable way.
This tour is a guided travel to each of the planets in the solar system in a virtual spaceship helping the user make decisions.you can choose a single planet to visit or you can take a tour to the entire solar system.You have the option to come back to earth and stop the tour at each step/planet.
There are supporting cards displayed on the Alexa app (Or echo show) to help kids get further insight. 
Along with kids, this can be great amusing and informative thing to the adults as well.
If you like this skill please rate it and feedback,suggestions most welcome.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
